properties.name: Copernicus University sports hall
properties.description: Nicolaus Copernicus University's sports hall, where [DFW Tournament of Dreams II](@/e/dfw/2016-08-20-dfw-tournament-of-dreams-2.md), [Recent Dreams](@/e/dfw/2017-04-23-dfw-recent-dreams.md) and [Anniversary](@/e/dfw/2017-09-30-dfw-anniversary.md) were held.
